channel.title: Need a quick approval!
channel.description:
Well in the client hacking section i recently noticed alot of errors being posted in the "Create a client - Rewrote" so i recently posted a simplified version, and how to fix the most common EGUI error.
I need people to approve it and please post whether it's more easier to follow, or whether it should get locked
Thank you
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,135606.0.html
